org.jirduino.config

Class JSONController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jirduino.config.JSONController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigController

    public class JSONController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigController
    Controller JSON Configuration Class, used for IR remote controllers configuration. JSON files are stored into folder specified by RemoteDefaultSettings.JSON_FOLDER (default: data/config/remotes)
    Author:
    Emanuele Paiano

      • addKey

        public Signal addKey(java.lang.String keyName,
                     java.lang.String valuePress,
                     java.lang.String valueRelease,
                     java.lang.String valueDown)
        Add keys to config
        Parameters:
        keyName - key name (i.e. POWER)
        valuePress - hex value press command (i.e. E0E040BF)
        valueDown - hex value down command
        valueRelease - hex value release command

      • addKey

        public Signal addKey(java.lang.String keyName,
                     Signal keyPress,
                     Signal keyRelease,
                     Signal keyDown)
        Add keys to config
        Specified by:
        addKey in interface ConfigController
        Parameters:
        keyName - key name (i.e. POWER)
        keyPress - signal press command (i.e. E0E040BF)
        keyDown - signal down command
        keyRelease - signal release command
        Returns:
        keyPress signal

        public static java.util.List<JSONController> probeConfigByKeyEvent(java.lang.String key,
                                                                   java.lang.String hexValue,
                                                                   java.lang.String event)
        Probe configurations by inputs key, event and hex Value.
        Parameters:
        key - configurations key
        hexValue - value to check
        event - can be press, release or down
        Returns:
        JSONController list with configs
